experiences.description: AI Engineer at MENT, a privacy-first network intelligence platform helping individuals build meaningful relationships.
achievements: Researched, developed, and optimized AI-driven features for MENT platform
Built and maintained services and pipelines for data enrichment, retrieval, insight generation, and chatbot functionalities
Designed scalable and efficient microservices to support high-performance backend communication and data processing
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to deliver innovative AI solutions that enhanced platform reliability and user experience
Optimized AI models and pipelines to align with business goals, improving accuracy, efficiency, and user satisfaction
Applied prompt engineering and fine-tuning techniques to improve LLM performance
Stayed current with advancements in AI and backend technologies, integrating innovations to enhance platform features

experiences.description: AI Engineer focused on Machine Learning, Deep Learning systems, and Arabic NLP tools development.
achievements: Conducted extensive research and experimentation with modern ML and DL systems
Maintained, optimized, and deployed ML & DL systems ensuring high performance and reliability
Designed and developed microservices using Flask, Spring Boot, and Go-fiber frameworks
Built spam filter service, synonym extraction service, and English-to-Arabic transliteration service
Prepared, transformed, and analyzed data using pandas, matplotlib, and seaborn for business insights
Prototyped NLP tools for Arabic language including spelling correction, NER, POS tagging, and semantic search

experiences.description: Full-stack web developer contributing to multiple web and mobile applications.
achievements: Contributed to development of multiple web and mobile applications
Developed responsive front-end applications using Angular
Built cross-platform mobile applications with Ionic Framework
Designed and implemented admin dashboards for managing users, content, and operations
Contributed to back-end development with Node.js, improving system functionality and performance
Supported various company projects handling both front-end and full-stack tasks
